original_text: Jesus did many other miracles while the disciples were with him. I have not written about all of them in this book.
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들 앞에서 이 책에 기록되지 아니한 다른 표적도 많이 행하셨으나

sentences.original_text: while the disciples were with him
I have not written about all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 모든 것에 대해 기록하지 않았다
